tables.description: Info on each chip in the frame
Info on each target field (position, Num exposures, etc)
Average photometry of each unique object
All of the individual source measurements
Average photometry of each unique object only from deep exposures
Crossmatch of object against GAIA DR2 and WISE

columns.description: Galactic longitude of field, in degrees
Galactic latitude of field, in degrees
HEALPIX index (Nsides 4096, Nest scheme => ~52 arcsec size)
Short field name for the PHOTRED reduction
Base of all files for this chip
Filter, u, g, r, i, or z
Right ascension at center of chip (in degrees)
Declination at center of chip (in degrees)
RMS in WCS fit with respect to reference catalog in arcsec
The RMS of the residuals using the GAIA DR1 reference stars
GAIA DR1 matches used for the astrometric fitting
FWHM of PSF (i.e. seeing) in pixels (multiply by 0.26 to get arcsec)
Total number of DAOPHOT/ALLSTAR sources in chip
ALLSTAR depth (peak of the source histogram), instrumental mags
Number of stars used to construct PSF
Analytical function type for DAOPHOT PSF
Median SFD E(B-V) for this chip
Exposure number for the reference frame
First RA value for the four corners of the chip
Second RA value for the four corners of the chip
Third RA value for the four corners of the chip
Fourth RA value for the four corners of the chip
First DEC value for the four corners of the chip
Second DEC value for the four corners of the chip
Third DEC value for the four corners of the chip
Fourth DEC value for the four corners of the chip
Number of sources in SOURCE table for this chip
Is this chip calibrated or not
The magnitude offset applied from the ubercal algorithm
The zero-point offset used for this chip
The uncertainty in the zero-point offset
Is this from a photometric night
Did we have a good transformation equation/solution for these data
Transformation equation band name to construct the color
Transformation equation uncertainty in zeropoint term
Transformation equation uncertainty in airmass/extinction term
Sigma of color term in calibration

Number of chips with good data for this exposure, normally 60 or 61
Filter, u, g, r, i, or z
Right ascension at center of frame (in degrees)
Declination at center of frame (in degrees)
RMS in WCS fit w.r.t. ref catalog in arcsec, median of chips
RMS in WCS fit w.r.t. GAIA catalog in arcsec, median of chips
FWHM of PSF (i.e. seeing) in pixels, median across chips
Median sky background level across chips
Median sigma in sky background across chips
Total number of DAOPHOT/ALLSTAR sources in frame
Median ALLSTAR depth across all chips, instrumental mags
Median DAOPHOT PSF chi value across all chips

Did we have a good transformation equation/solution for these data

Magellanic Stream latitude of field, in degrees

Unique ID for this source, the field name plus a running number
Deep ID for this source, same as in object table
ID used for this detection in the original als/alf chip file
ID used for this detection in the reference frame file
Filter, u, g, r, i, or z
X-coordinate for this source in the original chip (1-indexed)
Y-coordinate for this source in the original chip (1-indexed)
X-coordinate for this source in the reference chip (1-indexed)
Y-coordinate for this source in the reference chip (1-indexed)
Boolean flag indicating if this is forced (ALLFRAME) photometry
Instrumental magnitude from ALLFRAME or ALLSTAR (not both)
Uncertainty of CMAG including errors in calibration
DAOPHOT chi value, i.e. how well the PSF fit this source
DAOPHOT sharp value, measurement of peakiness
Source Extractor FLAG value from coadd image
Right Ascension (J2000.0) of source, in degrees

Uncertainty in DEC (arcseconds) based on S/N of source and PSF FWHM

Declination of source, from the original chip X/Y and WCS
Right Ascension of source, from X/YREF and ref WCS
Declination (J2000.0) of source, in degrees, from the referene chip chip file using XREF/YREF coords and the reference chip WCS
Boolean flag indicating if a match with GAIA DR2 was found.
GAIA DR2 proper motion in RA (mas/yr)
GAIA DR2 proper motion in RA uncertainty (mas/yr)
